name: Doom
description: After defeating your foes in Hell you find they fled to Earth.

name: Fled the Riots
description: You were assigned to the last of the real riots; one of the last to flee when the rioters stopped breathing but kept moving.

name: Out of Town
description: You were outside of civilization when the bombs fell; you didn't even know the end had come, or that everyone was (un)dead.  Will this ignorance save you from the fate of the rest?
